feed.title: Ahmed Arafa
feed.subtitle: DevOps Engineer sharing thoughts on automation, infrastructure, debugging adventures, and the occasional "how not to break production" story.

entry.title: Hello
entry.content:
Hello! Welcome to my blog.

This is my first post and I’m excited to start sharing content here.

I’ll be writing about various topics that interest me, sharing experiences, and hopefully creating something useful for readers.

Thanks for stopping by!
entry.summary: Welcome to my blog! A simple introduction.
